job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: We're working with a market leader in electronic health records (EHR) bases studies. Partnered with world class biotechnology and pharmaceutical firms, their platform runs real world evidence studies for regulatory and reimbursement purposes.Utilizing data science and AI, this company is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to take ownership of the full machine learning life-cycle, from data cleaning and pre-processing, to deploying state-of-the-art models into production. You will:Verify data quality, supervise the data and find available datasetsTrain models and tuning their hyperparametersDefine pre-processing and validation strategiesBuilds, refine and productionize machine learning models Present model outcomes You have:Bachelors or above in Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering or other related fieldExpertise with Python and basic libraries for machine learning (pandas and scikit-learn)Expertise with deep learning frameworksProficiency with scripting or other techniques for rapid data transformation and cleanupExpertise in visualizing and manipulating big unstructured datasetsExperience with cloud-based machine learning resources (AWS)Big Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.
